title: Facebook URL to ID · Apify
name: Facebook URL to ID
description: Scraping any Facebook URL as data object with internal Facebook ID and metadata if-when available.
readme_summary: Scraping any Facebook URL as data object with internal Facebook ID and metadata if-when available. Input example: Redirect from `https://www.facebook.com/nintendo` resolved as `https://www.facebook.com/NintendoAmerica` and public group `germtheory.vs.terraintheory` resolved as group with post. Output example: `details` stripped since too different across data. Pattern is `url` as was provided in input, `facebookId` calculated by actor from data (more like a suggestion) and typed object with details.
